H0.text: Whose portrait replaced Michael Faraday on the back of a £20 note. Charles Dickens

H1.text: Whose portrait replaced Michael Faraday on the back of a £20 note. Isaac Newton

H2.text: Whose portrait replaced Michael Faraday on the back of a £20 note. Jane Austen

H3.text: Whose portrait replaced Michael Faraday on the back of a £20 note. Elgar

A4.text: Series E notes were replaced by a variant design from 1999 onwards and feature Edward Elgar on the reverse.
